name: The Servants' Corridor
description:
You are standing in a corridor, that stretches further to the east.
There are doors to the north and west.  The corridor itself is mainly
used by servants, and lacks some of the beauty of the rest of the
castle.

exits.keywords: door~ 1 -1 15026 D1 The corridor seems to come to its end a bit further east.

exits.description: The door to the west is made out of wood.
exits.keywords: door wood~ 1 -1 15020 S #15022 The End Of The Servants' Corridor~    The corridor leads only west from here, but there is a door to the north.

exits.description: The door leads to a room intended for the butler.
exits.keywords: door~ 1 15009 15027 D3 You see the corridor continue.
